data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wilson J. E. M. Costa (2006): Taxonomy and phylogenetic relationships among species of the seasonal, internally inseminating, South American killifish genus Campellolebias (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae), with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 1227: 31-55, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:EDE15FA8-8DF4-4989-8283-122424B3253F|24 occurrences
